item.title: India and change: Walking Barefoot through Life's Lessons
item.description: Send us a text Discover the transformative power of stepping off the beaten path as I recount my enriching travels through India's spiritual heartland, Tamil Nadu. Join me in exploring how this journey offered more than just sights and soundsâ€”it provided profound lessons in embracing uniqueness amidst unfamiliar surroundings. Feel the pulse of Bhakti yoga and the grace found in temple rituals, while also reflecting on newfound appreciations for everyday freedoms. This episode marks a fresh ch...
